children.value: The SyncML initiative recently consolidated into the Open Mobile Alliance (OMA), contributing their technical work to the OMA technical Working Groups:
Archived versions of SyncML Specifications, Superseded by Version 1.1
The following Archive Downloads are the archived documents from the SyncML initiative.
